pullrequest.title: Update to match new MATLAB API

content.raw:
Dear all,

I am having the following problem: after I successfully installed Gazebo-haptix and the octave packages, I tried to run the hx_matlab_controller.m example, octave runs this output

```
octave:1> hx_matlab_controller
error: hxgz: Expects 8 fields
error: called from:
error:   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_update.m at line 87, column 10
error:   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_matlab_controller.m at line 63, column 9
octave:1> 
octave:1> 
octave:1> exit
 
```
I supposed that there is a mismatching between the cmd structure in hx_matlab_controller.m and what the hx_update.c takes as input.

thank you in advance for any suggestion
content.html:
Dear all,

I am having the following problem: after I successfully installed Gazebo-haptix and the octave packages, I tried to run the hx_matlab_controller.m example, octave runs this output

octave:1> hx_matlab_controller
error: hxgz: Expects 8 fields
error: called from:
error:   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_update.m at line 87, column 10
error:   /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/haptix-comm/octave/hx_matlab_controller.m at line 63, column 9
octave:1> 
octave:1> 
octave:1> exit

I supposed that there is a mismatching between the cmd structure in hx_matlab_controller.m and what the hx_update.c takes as input.

thank you in advance for any suggestion
